explains: n. 德比（英国中部的都市）；德比赛马；大赛马

sentences.en: Arazi is odds-on to win the Kentucky Derby.
sentences.cn: 阿拉兹十有八九会在肯塔基赛马会上获胜。

sentences.en: Do you always have a bet on the Kentucky Derby?
sentences.cn: 你总是在肯塔基赛马大会上赌马吗？

sentences.en: The Derby will be run in spite of the bad weather.
sentences.cn: 尽管天气恶劣，德比马赛仍将举行。
